::: Demona had selected her quarters. They were furnished and well layed out. 
She sat on a sofa and waited for her arrivals. :::

::: Demona got p when she heard a knock at the door. In entered Black Aracnia 
and Pheniox. she led them to the sofa and they all sat down. :::

::: Demona began ::: Fellow fembots, how was your day?

::: Black Aracnia ::: Well, besides being stuck behinde a computer all week, 
it was dull.

::: Pheniox ::: Its the same for me.

::: Demona ::: Why do you put up with it?

::: The paused and couldnt think of an answer. ::: 

::: Demona ::: Thats what I thought. Now, we as fembots are far superior to 
any male bot here. Black Aracnia is far smarter than Hell Beast. She should 
lead the Predacons!

::: Black Aracnia smiled ::: I cant argue with you on that one...

::: Demona ::: And just imagine what we could do if the fembots joined 
together!

::: Pheniox ::: You mean...

::: Demona ::; Yes. We would not fight agianst any fraction, but agianst the 
malebots who ensale us. Once in power we would end this awful war and return 
to Cybertron where females would rule in superiority.

::: Black Aracnia ::: But no Maximal would join us..

::: Demona ::: Yes. We wouldnt be fighting the Maximals dierectly. We would 
bea gianst any fraction that didnt listen to us. Even the predacons.

::: Pheniox ::: Well, its a lot to offer....but Im in. I wouldnt mind being 
in power for a change.

::: Demona and Black Aracnia agreed and the first members of the League of 
Fembots was established. :::
